DOC.brief_summary: Efficacy safety compare interferon alfacon-1 alone concomitant dose interferon alfacon-1 ribavirin hepatitis C patient .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Efficacy Safety Between Interferon Alfacon-1 Alone Concomitant Dosing With Ribavirin Treatment Hepatitis C
